lom:description.lom:string: Best practices from the NSF ADVANCE Program to increase the representation and advancement of women in academic science and engineering careers. Being able to make a change at the institutional level can be difficult. Here you can read about four different ways that universities have been influenced to advance women in science and engineering. Activities that Influence Change; Institutional Structure; Policies that Influence Change; Practices that Influence Change.

lom:keyword.lom:string: ADVANCE - NSF, gender equity, women in science, women in mathematics, women in engineering, women in computing, institutional change
